input.sentences: then we took a photo of a glass .
there were some demons in the house .
output.sentences: My roommate decided to place green lights in the living room.
The glasses and other items in the house look pretty with the light.
The statues of the demons disturb me and I wish my roommate would get rid of them.
My roommate is an artist and thinks it's OK to use the house of our apartment as his canvas.
I wish my artist roommate would do something to spruce up this room because it's very gloomy.
